<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>

The [flower of life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flower_of_Life) panel. I was doing my best to stay away from the hippy dippy stuff. When I asked for suggestions on what other types of panels to include this was by far the most suggested one. You gotta give the people what they want.
